channel.title: Whonix 14 has still the same way of connecting Windows as Whonix 13?
channel.description:
Hi!
There is an article https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems and part of this article is about how to use Windows with Whonix Gateway. Is this information still actual for Whonix 14?
Still the same settings should be applied for Windows network adapter?
IP address 10.152.152.50 Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0 Default gateway 10.152.152.10 Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10
Thank you!

item.title: Whonix 14 has still the same way of connecting Windows as Whonix 13?
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Since no-one replied in the negative, Iâ€™d take that as a yes

item.title: Whonix 14 has still the same way of connecting Windows as Whonix 13?
item.dc:creator: ckop
item.description:
Hi!

There is an article https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems and part of this article is about how to use Windows with Whonix Gateway. Is this information still actual for Whonix 14?

Still the same settings should be applied for Windows network adapter?

IP address 10.152.152.50
Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0
Default gateway 10.152.152.10
Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10

Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix 14 has still the same way of connecting Windows as Whonix 13?
